sourcesContent:
<template>
    <a-row :gutter="gutter">
        <a-col :span="8">
            <Profile :user="user"/>
        </a-col>
        <a-col :span="16">
            <a-card :bordered="false" :tabList="tabList" :activeTabKey="activeTabKey" @tabChange="bindClickTab">
                <router-view></router-view>
            </a-card>
        </a-col>
    </a-row>
</template>

<script>
    import {Profile} from '@/components';
    import {mapState} from 'vuex';

    let tabList = [
        {tab: '通知管理', key: '/account/profile/notification'},
        {tab: '消息中心', key: '/account/profile/message'},
        {tab: '待办事项', key: '/account/profile/todo'},
        {tab: '操作日志', key: '/account/profile/logs'},
    ];

    export default {
        inject: ['gutter'],
        components: {Profile},
        data() {
            return {
                tabList,
                activeTabKey: ''
            }
        },
        computed: {
            ...mapState({
                user: state => state.account.user
            })
        },
        mounted() {
            this.activeTabKey = this.$route.path;
        },
        methods: {
            bindClickTab(key) {
                this.$router.push(key);
                this.activeTabKey = key;
            }
        },
        watch: {
            '$route'(value) {
                this.activeTabKey = value.path;
            }
        }
    }
</script>
